faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Sempitecno AI solutions.

questions.q: How does Sempitecno ensure AI security?
questions.a: We prioritize data privacy through end-to-end encryption and anonymization protocols. For Enterprise clients, we offer on-premise deployments and isolated AI instances to ensure your proprietary data never leaves your infrastructure. We are currently pursuing SOC2 Type II certification.

questions.q: Can it integrate with my existing CRM?
questions.a: Yes, Sempitecno features native connectors for Salesforce, HubSpot, and Microsoft Dynamics. Our API-first approach allows for seamless two-way synchronization, ensuring your customer data is always up-to-date across all platforms.

questions.q: What is the typical setup time?
questions.a: Starter and Growth plans can be up and running in under 24 hours. Enterprise deployments, which often include custom training and security audits, typically range from 2 to 4 weeks depending on complexity.

questions.q: Is there a discount for annual billing?
questions.a: Absolutely. When you choose annual billing, you receive two months free (roughly 17% savings) compared to month-to-month subscriptions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: At SEMPITECNO, your privacy is our priority. We implement military-grade encryption for all AI data processing. Our agents only access the specific data points required for task completion. We never sell your data to third parties.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content: By using SEMPITECNO's AI solutions, you agree to our standard operating procedures. Our uptime guarantee is 99.9%. Users are responsible for the integrity of the data provided to the AI agents.

security.title: Security Framework
security.content: Our infrastructure is built on SOC2-compliant cloud providers. We perform weekly vulnerability scans and maintain a zero-trust architecture for all internal and external communication protocols.

cta.title: Ready to digitize your industry?
cta.description: Connect with our experts to build a tailored AI strategy that fits your unique business needs.
